channel.title: President-Elect Solomon
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/
channel.description:
President-Elect Obama presents himself as a committed Christian, yet co-sponsored the most sweeping piece of pro-abortion legislation ever proposed in Congress. He also supports partial-birth abortions and no aid to those born alive in botched, late term abortions.
Solomon also claimed to be a committed believer; nevertheless, he was the first ruler to allow and even participate in the abominable worship of Molech, which required live child sacrifices. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: Mary Diane Goin
channel.itunes:subtitle: President-Elect Solomon
channel.itunes:summary:
President-Elect Obama presents himself as a committed Christian, yet co-sponsored the most sweeping piece of pro-abortion legislation ever proposed in Congress. He also supports partial-birth abortions and no aid to those born alive in botched, late term abortions.
Solomon also claimed to be a committed believer; nevertheless, he was the first ruler to allow and even participate in the abominable worship of Molech, which required live child sacrifices. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:keywords: Obama, Planned Parenthood, Margaret Sanger, abortion, Christian action, Election 2008, voting, politics, Christian witness, Constitution, Bible
